title: Bobby Buys A Sports Team + Country Artist Gets Road Rage Driving Behind Bobby + The Girl Group Responds To Listener Struggling With Her Husband’s Terrible Style
itunes:title: Bobby Buys A Sports Team + Country Artist Gets Road Rage Driving Behind Bobby + The Girl Group Responds To Listener Struggling With Her Husband’s Terrible Style
description:
Bobby talks about buying a sports team. A country artist admits to getting road rage driving behind Bobby. The Girl Group responds to a listener email from a wife that’s struggling with her husband’s terrible fashion. Wounded veteran Scotty West calls in to talk with Bobby about our upcoming #PIMPINJOY campaign to build him a new house. Also, Amy talks about the reason her husband created a ‘burner’ Instagram account.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
